Author: jl777c#5810
Content: the problem is that miners that control the order of tx have perfect information and can make riskless trades to take advantage of the orderflow

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: the solution is to not have miners in the process

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: but that of course requires an offchain DEX with no single orderbook

Author: klein#5233
Content: I''ve still got a lot to reading to do understand the non financial technical part

Author: klein#5233
Content: makes sense

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: its like having a single broker handle ALL trades from everybody

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: you need to trust that they wont front run

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: and any system that has a single broker who has no reason not to take advantage of free money....

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: i think on some stock markets there are specialists who are charged with making a market, but they have specific responsibilities and would lose their monopoly position if they abuse it

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: in a decentralized system, it can be anybody, even somebody you are trading with

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: would you trade against your broker, knowing he knows the entire orderflow?

Author: klein#5233
Content: correct exchange and mm are supposed to be two separate entities
